thread.title: AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists

title: AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists
text: SUBSCRIBE FOLLOW US Â© 2015 Cox Media Group . By using this website, you accept the terms of our Visitor Agreement and Privacy Policy , and understand your options regarding Ad Choices . Learn about careers at Cox Media Group . AP PHOTOS: Bosnian promoting 'slow way of life' to artists In this photo taken on Saturday, Oct. 3, 2015, Sead Ascic, an amateur novelist, poses for a photo in his old Yugoslav made car during a weekend gathering of various artists in the village of Dzafici, 100 kms north of Sarajevo. To allow people a break from their busy lives, Bosnian man Rasim Hamidovic, 60, is organising weekend gatherings of various artists in his home in Dzafici to remind them and other villagers of the old way of life in harmony with nature. (AP Photo/Amel Emric) Most Read
